body.p: The following requirements must be met in order to use Mibble:
This software does not require any special installation. The only files needed are the jar-files in the lib subdirectory.

Mibble is a library, and has no main application in this release. There are some test applications, however - a MIB file browser, a pretty-printer and a validator. These tools can be run from the launcher scripts:
The above scripts should find and set the Java CLASSPATH to the jar-files in the lib subdirectory:
